trans-unit.resname: DDF·13 | Kemba's Skyguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDF·13 | Kemba's Skyguard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: DDF·63 | Contagion Clasp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DDF·63 | Contagion Clasp | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）
